common.tagline: Empowering Local Businesses Through Intelligent Automation

portfolio.title: Portfolio Projects
portfolio.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I have worked on.

items.title: A secure and lokal LLM / RAG system
items.description: In today’s data-driven world, organizations face two persistent challenges: Managing massive amounts of scattered information, and Protecting sensitive data from leaving secure environments.

items.title: Automating Reddit Fintech Intelligence with n8n
items.description: In the fast-paced world of financial services, valuable insights often live in scattered community discussions — buried inside forums, subreddits, and endless comment threads.

items.title: Chrome Extension: CV & Job Description Analyzer
items.description: Applying for jobs can be frustrating — you tailor your CV, send out dozens of applications, and often hear nothing back. One reason is that many companies use Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) to filter candidates.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I am a developer and strategist with a passion for leveraging technology to solve real-world business problems. My mission is to build powerful, intelligent automation that empowers businesses to focus on what they do best.

contact.title: Let's Build Together
contact.subtitle: Ready to automate your workflows and unlock your business's full potential? Reach out to us. We're excited to learn about your challenges.
contact.thank_you_message: Your message has been sent. We'll be in touch shortly.

chat.welcome: Hi! I'm Tarek's portfolio assistant. Ask me about his experience or projects.
